name: Crab Invasion (wishopt)
description:
Game created for the Miz Jam 1

I originally planned a RPG with an overworld and dungeons and stuff, and I carefully tried to design my code in a way that lets me add new features easily. Then I ended up having way less time to spend on the game than I liked because life and stuff. Because of that, I had to cut 90% of the game, implement only a single enemy, and tape it together with spaghetti code. Don't expect art.

Controls:
WASD: Movement
Left Click: Attack in the direction of the cursor
Right Click: Invincible dash

I recommend playing in full screen mode to make sure you don't accidentally click outside of the game window.
